version_description: This update solves an issue caused by changes to the "Add Measurement" screen in version 3.6.
This update solves an issue caused by changes to the "Add Measurement" screen in version 3.6.

We fixed a minor bug and updated our app icon for a fresh, new look.

If you like Blood Pressure Assistant, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review on the App Store? We'd greatly appreciate it. Thanks for your support!
